roast: Congrats! You’ve officially mastered the art of doing absolutely nothing. Is your couch your spirit animal?
fixes: Set a timer for breaks instead of 'doing nothing'.
Plan a structured activity after football to keep the momentum.
Limit idle time to 15 minutes max to avoid spiraling into a void.
suggestions: Try a new hobby that keeps you engaged.
Join a group or class to meet people and stay active.
Schedule your downtime—yes, even doing nothing can be organized!
